changes: Updated yt-dlp
Gave Miku a YouTube account so she can watch age-restricted videos
Added suicide command
Fixed urls not working with play command
Added the ability to specify starting point in video
Added seek command
Added feedback to play when using a url
Automated behind-the-scenes updates
Fixed bot not responding after joining voice channel
Bot now automatically leaves when voice channel is empty
Fixed not being able to turn off repeat
Fixed videos ending early
Fixed videos no longer being played
Added support for live videos (will show length as None)
Added support for restricted videos
Added support for official shortened youtube urls (youtu.be)
Added command to check most recent changes (/changelogs)
Fixed message not being sent when a video was added to queue
Fixed issue regarding using bot in one server causing the bot to sometimes stop in another
Fixed messages being sent despite bot not being in Voice Channel
Added support for multiple servers using music functionality
Added ability to repeat current video
Restricted status command to bot moderators (not server mods)
